summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Nye Place, in the City of Seattle, from a point one hundred twenty (120) feet east of Twentieth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, openings, manholes with Resolution No. 724 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
